name: Nuclear Scavenger
description:
SYNOPSIS:

In this game you control our favourite robot "GOLD" and his daily grind to obtain his Lost Parts and obtain the necessary substance he needs to survive.

Retrieving these Parts from these Quarantine zones are the only thing keeping him alive.

The scavenging fields are filled with traps and hazards. Not only does GOLD need to worry about traps, but he must also ensure that the radiation does not fry his circuits.

GLOBAL GAME JAM LINK:

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/nuclear-scavenger-2

HOW TO PLAY:

Use WASD to move Gold and Use the Mouse to change is View. Left Click on a Zone he is not standing on, to dig it and obtain the Resources below. Avoid Radiation Zones and Collect 3 Part Boxes to Win!

CREDITS:
